alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 25 at 3:00AM EST until December 26 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning this morning, duration of freezing temperatures between 6 and 10 hours, and duration of below 28 degrees will be between 2 and 4 hours. For the Freeze Watch late tonight, freezing temperatures around 32 possible. * WHERE...Coastal Volusia County. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Bring pets and potted plants indoors. Check on elderly neighbors to make sure their furnace is working.To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Cover above-ground exposed pipes to protect them from freezing.
